name: MideaAirDehumidifierSmart
0:
”Alexa, Turn on living room.”
”Alexa, living room humidity set to 60.”
”Alexa, living room set to smart mode.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using this skill, you can control Midea Air dehumidifier: turn on/off, change modes, humidity and fan speed.
After the user wakes up the speaker by “Alexa, turn on dehumidifier.” to call this skill, you can easily control the dehumidifier. 
Uses must do Account Linking following the steps below:
1. Click the ENABLE button, then enter the registered Midea Air account.
2. If you do not have a Midea Air account, please download Midea Air App from Apple AppStore or Google Play
3. After installation and registration, complete the air conditioner activation configuration.
4. Back to the Account Linking interface of Alexa APP, enter the registered Midea Air account to complete Account Linking.
